channel.title: Token shop 1 error
channel.description:
Hey guys i have been trying to make token shop lately and this is what i get:
src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:406: error: <identifier> expected public boolean addShopItem(int itemID, amount) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . . :palm:
Anyone has any idea how to fix it? [COLOR="#FF0000"]Im very noobie to java so please answer me in the noob terms :/[/COLOR]

item.title: Token shop 1 error
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Then remove that method entirely and keep the original one.

Read full topic

item.description:

and if i add another int it gives that dublicate error

item.title: Token shop 1 error
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Change that line from
public boolean addShopItem(int itemID, amount) {
to
public boolean addShopItem(int itemID, int amount) {

Read full topic
